description:
Included : This Carrier has been invited to the E4P marketplace. </br> Included : This Carrier has agreed to be bound by your purchasing conditions while performing this transport.
 Please note however that (i) if there is a comment on this bid (visible on the right), it will be binding to you and you must take it into consideration and (ii) if there were Chat exchanges, these will not be contractually binding for Carrier, and such information will be excluded from the binding order confirmation PDF.
